description: Template storyboard with complete field structure for CINDERGRACE pipeline

shots.description: Wide establishing shot of the main location
shots.prompt: wide angle cinematic shot of a futuristic city skyline at sunset, golden hour lighting, dramatic clouds, flying vehicles in distance, neon signs beginning to glow, hyper-realistic, 8k quality, cinematic composition
shots.negative_prompt: blurry, low quality, distorted, deformed, bad anatomy, oversaturated

wan_motion.notes: Slow forward dolly movement revealing the city

shots.prompt: medium shot of a young woman in futuristic clothing standing on a rooftop, confident pose, wind blowing hair, city lights behind her, dramatic rim lighting, cinematic portrait, cyberpunk aesthetic, neon reflections
shots.negative_prompt: blurry, bad face, deformed hands, low quality, cartoon

wan_motion.notes: Minimal atmospheric movement, focus on character

shots.description: Close-up of protagonist activating a holographic device
shots.prompt: extreme close-up of hands holding and activating a holographic device, blue glowing interface projecting upward, futuristic UI elements, shallow depth of field, cinematic macro shot, sci-fi technology
shots.negative_prompt: blurry, deformed hands, bad anatomy, low resolution

wan_motion.notes: Slow push-in on the device with slight handheld feel

shots.description: Protagonist's reaction to information on the device
shots.prompt: close-up of young woman's face illuminated by blue holographic light from below, surprised expression, wide eyes, detailed facial features, cinematic lighting, cyberpunk mood, neon reflections in eyes
shots.negative_prompt: blurry, bad face, asymmetrical eyes, low quality, deformed

wan_motion.notes: Very subtle movement to maintain focus on expression

shots.description: Protagonist leaps from rooftop with city in background
shots.prompt: dynamic action shot of woman in mid-jump from rooftop, flowing coat billowing, futuristic city skyline below, dramatic lighting, motion blur on edges, cinematic action composition, heroic pose, neon-lit cityscape
shots.negative_prompt: blurry face, static pose, low quality, bad anatomy, deformed limbs

wan_motion.notes: Camera follows the jump with dynamic pan movement

generation_settings.notes: Default settings for keyframe generation phase

notes: This is a complete template storyboard showing all available fields. Use this as a reference when creating new storyboards via the Storyboard Editor or manually.
